title: GEA Punctuality Dashboard
description: HR tool to analyze employee timesheet CSVs and surface punctuality insights with exportable reports

pages.name: Upload
pages.purpose: Drag-and-drop CSV upload with progress and preview

pages.name: Results
pages.purpose: Interactive dashboard showing most/least punctual employees and team analytics

acceptance_criteria: Preview shows first 5 rows after upload
Most/Least punctual cards display top employee per category using name column
Table shows green check/red clock badges
Chart tooltips show exact minutes early/late
PDF report includes GE branding and date range
